name: Jamming Dilemma
description:
This game was developed for Ludum Dare 43. It's theme was "Sacrifices Must Be Made".  This was our first LD and we wanted to make something simple that could be wrapped with time.

We were following the theme voting and waiting anxiously for the jam, up until the moment we figured out sacrifices were gonna be necessary. We decided to do a game about jamming. More specifically, about LD 43 and the dilemma it presented.

Instructions:

The Jam is about to start and you need to figure out whether you are bailing out or joining the jam!

Some ideas will be shown to you in cards, throw them out the bin or keep them if related to the theme.

If you figure it out on time, join the jam!

Team:
  • Brocoli - developer
  • Cabrita - artist
  • Rapyo - designer
Tools:
  • Godot
  • Sketchbook
  • Bfxr
  • GIMP
  • git
  • Pen and paper
